mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Bell, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Bell, John Patient Age: 34. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Convalescent from US Genl Hosptial Gallipolis Ohio wounded in left hand ball passing threough metacarpal phangeal joint middle finger amputated on the field at the middle third of his metacarpal bone. Location Wounded: In action at Lynchburg, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/06/18. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Returned to duty.
